intro.heading: Hi, I'm Dani
paragraphs: I create web applications that are not only functional but also visually appealing.
I enjoy designing intuitive and smooth interfaces.
I'm always looking to improve my code and learn new technologies.

stack.heading: Stack
stack.text: I specialize in a variety of languages and frameworks, currently focusing on front-end to create modern and intuitive web and mobile experiences.

location.heading: Located in
location.text: I'm based in Alicante, Spain. I'm open to remote work opportunities worldwide or relocating within Europe and Spain.

projects.title: WatchOver
projects.description: An anime catalog web app where you can find your favorite animes, search info, stay up to date with episodes, make your own list and more.
